text: Aytos Municipality (Bulgarian: Община Айтос, Obshtina Aytos) is a municipality in Burgas Province, Bulgaria. It includes the town of Aytos and 16 villages. == Religion == According to the latest Bulgarian census of 2011, the religious composition, among those who answered the optional question on religious identification, was the following: == Gallery == File:Aytos municipality.jpg | The building of Aytos Municipality File:Aytos municipality directorates 2.jpg | Additional building of the municipality == References == ==External links== * Category:Municipalities in Burgas Province
